Name: UL3 RNA #1 (orphan)
Justification: Peak in both dRNA-seq replicates. Accumulation of reads within +/-5 nt of the TiSS in both cRNA-seq replicates.

Name: UL4.5 RNA *1
Justification: Strong peak in both dRNA-seq replicates as well as in one of the two cRNA-seq replicates. Increase in downstream read-coverage in both cRNA-seq replicates.

Name: UL5.7 RNA
Justification: Strong peak in both dRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL5.7 ORF.

Name: UL6 RNA #1 (encodes UL6 iORF)
Justification: Strong peak in both dRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL6 iORF.

Name: UL7 RNA *1 (PacBio only; orphan)
Justification: Multiple PacBio reads starting at the same position accompanied by a weak increase in read densities in the 4sU-seq data.

Name: UL7.5 RNA
Justification: Weak peak in both cRNA-samples. Required for expression of UL7.5 uORF and UL7.5 ORF

Name: UL13.5 RNA
Justification: Strong peak in one cRNA-seq replicate and weak peak in the other cRNA-seq and both dRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL13.5 ORF.

Name: UL19.5 RNA
Justification: Strong peak in both dRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL19.5 sORF.

Name: UL21 RNA (encodes N-terminal extension of UL21)
UL21 RNA #1 (does not encode N-terminal extension of UL21)
UL31.6 RNA
Justification: Peak in one cRNA-seq replicate. Required for expression of UL31.6 ORF.

Name: UL32.5 RNA
Justification: Weak peak in both cRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL32.5 uORF.

Name: UL36.4 RNA
Justification: Strong peak in one cRNA-seq replicate. Strong increase in coverage downstream of the TiSS in both cRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL36.4 uORF.

Name: UL36.6 RNA (may start further upstream at 79448 or 79373 according to PacBio)
Justification: Strong peak in both dRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL36.6 uORF and UL36.6 ORF

Name: UL36.6 RNA iso1 (spliced)
Justification: Strong peak in both dRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL36.6 uORF and UL36.6 ORF

Name: UL36.6 RNA iso2 (NAGNAG, spliced)
Justification: Strong peak in both dRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL36.6 uORF and UL36.6 ORF

Name: UL40.5 RNA iso1 (spliced, encodes UL40.5 iORF)
UL40.6 RNA iso1 (spliced, encodes UL40.7 dORF)
UL46.5 RNA
Justification: Peak in both cRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL46.5 sORF 1 and 2.

Name: IRL2.5 RNA *1 (=LAT 0.7kb; =pri-miRNA-H1)
Justification: Strong peak in both dRNA-seq and one cRNA-seq replicate. Weak peak in the other cRNA-seq replicate. 0.7kb LAT.

Name: LAT iso1 (spliced)
Justification: Latency associated transcript (LAT)

Name: LAT
Justification: Latency associated transcript (LAT)

Name: US1.5 RNA (Carter & Roizman, JVI 1996)
Justification: Observed by Carter & Roizman, JVI 1996. No evidence for this TiSS in our data.

Name: Ori-S RNA (Hubenthal-Voss,Starr,Roizman JVI 1987; encode Ori-S CDS)
Justification: Observed by Hubenthal-Voss,Starr,Roizman JVI 1987. Weak peak as well as increase in read coverage downstream of TiSS in both cRNA-seq replicates.

Name: TRS1 RNA #1 (orphan, may encode truncated isoform of TRS1 CDS)
TRL2.5 RNA *1 (=LAT 0.7kb; =pri-miRNA-H1)
Justification: Strong peak in both dRNA-seq and one cRNA-seq replicate. Weak peak in the other sRNA-seq replicate.

Name: UL8.5 RNA *1 (Baradaran et al 1994; TiSS not observed)
UL9 RNA (Baradaran et al 1994; TiSS not observed)
UL14 RNA #1 (does not encode UL14 uORF 1 & 2)
UL20.6 RNA
Justification: Strong peak in both cRNA-seq replicates and notable increase in coverage downstream of TiSS. Required for expression of UL26.6 uORF and UL20.6 ORF.

Name: UL25.5 RNA
Justification: Strong peak in both dRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL25.5 ORF.

Name: UL30.6 RNA
Justification: Strong peak in both cRNA-seq replicates as well as a weak kinetic changes (increase late in infection) in both replicates.

Name: UL36 RNA #1 (orphan, may encode truncated isoform of UL36 CDS)
UL37 RNA #1 (initiates downstream of TaSS of UL37 uoORF)
UL39.5 RNA
Justification: Strong peak in both dRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL39.5 ORF.

Name: UL39.6 RNA
Justification: Strong peak in both dRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL39.6 ORF.

Name: UL50.6 RNA
Justification: Strong peak in both dRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL50.6 sORF.

Name: UL52.4 RNA
Justification: Strong peak in both dRNA-seq replicates. Required for expression of UL52.4 sORF.

Name: UL54.5 RNA (orphan)
Justification: Strong peak in both cRNA-seq replicates as well as a weak kinetic change (increase late in infection) in both replicates.

Name: AL-RNA (Perng et al., JVI 2002, not observed)
Justification: Observed by Perng et al., JVI 2002. No evidence for this TiSS in our data.

Name: IRS1 RNA #1 (orphan, may encode truncated isoform of IRS1 CDS)
US5.1 RNA (Jovasevic & Roizman Virol J 2010. not observed in TiSS or PacBio data; orphan)
Justification: Observed by Jovasevic & Roizman Virol J 2010. No evidence for this TiSS in our data.
